changes.name: Dashboard
changes.value: Completely restructured the dashboard with an updated group structure and functionality.

changes.name: Filtering
changes.value: Basic filtering functionality as well as save-search has been implemented.

changes.name: Interface
changes.value: New dashboard interface implemented. This is a complete overhaul of our dashboard interface.

changes.name: Features
changes.value: This is a complete overhaul of existing features, with many new features added, including: Homepage, Users, Groups and Group Management, Reporting Tags, Learning Reports, Jobs Reports, Careers Reports, Video Reports, and Messaging and Notes functions.
